FuncDef:
The map mtu command sets an MTU for IPv6 packets in a MAP instance.
The undo map mtu command restores the default MTU for IPv6 packets in a MAP instance.
The default MTU is 1500 bytes.
The default MTU is 1500 bytes.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the maximum transmission unit of IPv6 packets in a MAP instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 1280 to 9600. The default value is 1500, in bytes.

ExtraInfo: To set the MTU for IPv6 packets in a MAP-T or MAP-E instance, run the map rule command. To restore the default setting, run the undo map rule command.
